public static TextSource createTextForTooltip(@Nullable
                                                        java.lang.Object value)
        Create a text source intended to be used as a tooltip.
        Handles
        • NamedObject (Description)
        • OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject (Description)
        • LocalizedNamedObject (Description)
        • Notification (MessageDetail)
        Parameters:
        value - the value.
        Returns:
        the tooltip or null if the value wasn't suitable to generated a tooltip.
